s1.ptxt: Remove radiator cooling fan relay No.1 (1), No.3 (2) and/or No.2 (3) from relay box.
Check radiator cooling fan relay No.1 (1) and No.3 (2) as follows.

s2.ptxt: Check that there is no continuity between terminals “C” and “D”. If there is continuity, replace relay.
Connect battery positive (+) terminal to terminal “B” of relay.
Connect battery negative (–) terminal to terminal “A” of relay.
Check continuity between terminals “C” and “D”. If there is no continuity, replace relay.

s1.ptxt: Check radiator cooling fan relay No.2 (3) as follows.

s2.ptxt: Check that there is no continuity between terminals “G” or “H” and “F”. If there is continuity, replace relay.
Check continuity between terminals “I” and “H”. If there is no continuity, replace relay.
Connect battery positive (+) terminal to terminal “F” of relay.
Connect battery negative (–) terminal to terminal “E” of relay.
Check continuity between terminals “G” and “H”. If there is no continuity, replace relay.
